channel.title: NPC size
channel.description: A time ago I found a way to change the size of a npc. You had to edit it in the server files, not your client files. But now I can't find it anymore, so does anyone know what I'm talking about and knows where or how you can change it? =I

item.title: NPC size
item.dc:creator: @VbCoder VbCoder
item.description:
@VbCoder wrote:

A time ago I found a way to change the size of a npc.
You had to edit it in the server files, not your client files.
But now I can’t find it anymore, so does anyone know what I’m talking about and knows where or how you can change it? =I

Read full topic
